scriptContent.value:
param(
            [string] [Parameter(Mandatory=$true)] $ResourceGroupName,
            [string] [Parameter(Mandatory=$true)] $azureDataFactoryName
            )

          Connect-AzAccount -Identity

          # Stop Triggers
          Get-AzDataFactoryV2Trigger -DataFactoryName $azureDataFactoryName -ResourceGroupName $ResourceGroupName | Where-Object { $_.RuntimeState -eq 'Started' } | Stop-AzDataFactoryV2Trigger -Force | Out-Null

privateEndpointId.value: [reference(resourceId('Microsoft.DataFactory/factories/managedVirtualNetworks/managedPrivateEndpoints', split(format('{0}/{1}/pe-{2}-dfs', parameters('adfName'), parameters('managedVNetName'), parameters('privateStorageAccountName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}/pe-{2}-dfs', parameters('adfName'), parameters('managedVNetName'), parameters('privateStorageAccountName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/{1}/pe-{2}-dfs', parameters('adfName'), parameters('managedVNetName'), parameters('privateStorageAccountName')), '/')[2]), '2018-06-01').privateLinkResourceId]

scriptContent.value:
param(
            [string] [Parameter(Mandatory=$true)] $ResourceGroupName,
            [string] [Parameter(Mandatory=$true)] $azureDataFactoryName,
            [string] [Parameter(Mandatory=$true)] $privateLinkResourceId
          )

          Connect-AzAccount -Identity

          # Start Triggers
          Get-AzDataFactoryV2Trigger -DataFactoryName $azureDataFactoryName -ResourceGroupName $ResourceGroupName | Start-AzDataFactoryV2Trigger -Force | Out-Null

          # Approve DFS private endpoint
          foreach ($privateLinkConnection in (Get-AzPrivateEndpointConnection -PrivateLinkResourceId $privateLinkResourceId)) { if ($privateLinkConnection.PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.Status -eq "Pending") { Approve-AzPrivateEndpointConnection -ResourceId $privateLinkConnection.id } }
